subject: Is there a setUp/tearDown per TestCase?
msgSnippet: Hi, Is there a set of methods similar to setUp and tearDown that are called once for all the test methods in a testCase. i.e. if a class has 2 test methods in
messageBody:
Hi,

Is there a set of methods similar to setUp and tearDown that are called once
for all the test methods in a testCase.

i.e. if a class has 2 test methods in it, I want:

setup-method
test1
test2
teardown-method

instead of:

setUp
test1
tearDown
setUp
test2
tearDown

Thanks,

-- Rick
